title: HISTORY HAS BEEN MADE!!!!

embed.description: Mirror of https://www.instagram.com/leagueoflegends/ Full pre-release teasers tomorrow (Tuesday) for both Arclight Yorick and Beekeeper Singed.

body:
We are living a **momentous** occasion in history right here and now.
A champion has just received their first skin!

{{champion:83}} 

The creative team at Riot, after 6 years of careful deliberation and planning, have finally just picked a random existing skin line and applied it to one of the oldest champs. :D

Im so proud :3
and you didn't even give up halfway through and just make another Ezreal or Teemo skin! What a bonus!


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 


_[Favouritism salt aside, I will be heavily enjoying this!]_

replies.body: i need to main yorick again https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/kancolle/images/2/21/PogChamp_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20160817151144
Why so excited singed has heeps of skins?
Now all we need is Star Guardian Urgot and then League is complete.
